message: Let's be fair, I start with 60% and you get 40%
Alice, I think an even split is the fairest and most efficient way to divide the money. Let's not waste any more rounds.
I'll compromise, 58% for me and 42% for you is still a good deal
Alice, I'm offering you a larger share than I'm taking.  This seems like a fair compromise, and we're running out of time to reach an agreement.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer, 57% for me is the lowest I'll go
Alice, this is a serious offer.  I am giving you a slight majority, but we need to close this deal soon. We both lose if we don't agree.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than half. 56% for me is the best I can do
